long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VidClone is an extension that will allow you use your screen like a multivideo player. VidClone divide your screen automatically the same number of time like the number of videoplayers added and fixed each videoplayer ratio based the user configuration.

Functionalities
- Add several video players at the same time.
- One video control master
- Autoreload current time
- Random update current time
- Random change video file
- Change video rate
- Aditional video controls by each videoplayer
- Show/hide video controlers
